data.text: Hwɛ, ɔhene bi bedi hene wɔ trenee mu
Onipa biara bɛyɛ mframa ano hintabea
Wɔn a wohu no ani renkata bio,
Nea ɔyɛ adwene mu hare behu na wate ase,
Wɔremfrɛ ɔkwasea sɛ onuonyamfo bio
Ɔkwasea ka nkwaseasɛm
Apapahwekwa akwan yɛ amumɔyɛ,
Nanso onuonyamfo yɛ nhyehyɛe a ɛho wɔ nyam
Mo mmea a mugye mo ho di,
Afe akyi nna kakra bi no
Mo ho mpopo, mo mmea a mugye mo ho di
Mommobɔ mo koko so sɛ mowɔ mfuw afɛfɛ
ne me nkurɔfo asase,
Wobegyaw aban no hɔ,
kosi sɛ wobehwie honhom afi ɔsoro agu yɛn so,
Trenee bɛtena nweatam so
Adetreneeyɛ bɛsow asomdwoe aba;
Me nkurɔfo bɛtenatena mmeae a asomdwoe wɔ
Mpo sɛ mparuwbo sɛe kwae no
wobehyira wo,
